Package com.mlt.desktop.graphic

Class Composition

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.desktop.graphic.Composition
public class Composition
extends java.lang.Object
A composition concatenates a list of drawings with fill or draw operations.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    Segment structure.

    • getBounds

      private java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBounds​(Canvas.Context gc)
      Parameters:
      gc - The graphics context.
      Returns:
      The bounds of the composition without exceeding the context bounds and ensuring they completely cover the composition at pixel (integer-round) level.
